ACTIVATION_DESC: Please enter a password to complete the activation of your account.
ACTIVATION_ERROR_ALREADY_ACTIVE: Your account has already been activated. You can log in using your e-mail address and password {{link}}.
ACTIVATION_ERROR_NOT_REGISTERED: Please register with your e-mail address first {{link}}.
ADMIN_IDEAS_DENIED_DESC: Ideas that unfortunately have been rejected: {{value}}
FORM_EMAIL_ERROR_ALREADY_ACTIVATED_1: The e-mail address has already been activated. You can log in with your password. If you have forgotten your password, please click
FORM_EMAIL_ERROR_INVALID: Please enter a valid e-mail address
FORM_EMAIL_ERROR_INVALID_BLACKLIST: This service can only be used by employees with an e-mail address with a valid domain name.
FORM_EMAIL_ERROR_INVALID_UNIT: Your unit is not yet supported
FORM_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: An error has occurred. Please try again.
FORM_PASSWORD_ERROR_PATTERN: The password must consist of at least 8 characters and a special character.
IDEA_ADD_MESSAGE_1: Your idea has been successfully submitted.
IDEA_ADD_MESSAGE_2: Your idea will be released soon, we'll just check it quickly.
IDEA_UPDATE_MESSAGE: Your change has been saved successfully.
IDEA_VOTE_MESSAGE: Thank you very much for your evaluation.
IDEAS_ADD_DESC: You got an idea? Then submit it right here.
IDEAS_LOAD_MORE_LABEL_NO_MORE: There are no other ideas available
IDEAS_OWN_PUBLISHED_DESC: Ideas that are still being voted on: {{value}}
IDEAS_OWN_REJECTED_DESC: Ideas that unfortunately have been rejected: {{value}}
IDEAS_VOTE_DESC: Here you can rate submitted ideas. Every vote counts!
INTRO_DESC: Become part of the community! Click here to login
INTRO_HERO_P_1: You have a new idea for a project but never had the right opportunity to talk about it?
INTRO_HERO_P_2: Here's your chance! Finally you can publish your ideas and suggestions for various campaigns of the group. You can evaluate and discuss them, and even actively participate in their design if successful. Talk to skeptics and supporters, discuss suggestions and binary codes, benefit from feedback from your colleagues and create the optimal project for you. But be aware:
INTRO_HERO_P_3: Be creative! Be smart! Be innovative!
INTRO_HERO_P_4: Competition never sleeps! Be at the forefront when the time is coming:
INTRO_HERO_P_5: AXEL SPRINGER - WITH US FOR THE FUTURE
LOGIN_ERROR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Your login information is invalid. Please check the data you have entered.
OVERVIEW_IDEAS_NO_CAMPAIGN: Currently there are no idea campaigns available
OVERVIEW_PROTOTYPES_NO_CAMPAIGN: Unfortunately there is no prototype campaign at the moment.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY_DESC: Enter the e-mail address by which you registered. You will receive an e-mail from us with a confirmation link to reset your password.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY_ERROR_EMAIL_NOT_REGIST: The e-mail address has not been registered yet. Just try {{link}}.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY_SUCCESS_DESC: We have sent an e-mail with a confirmation link to {{email}}. Please open your mailbox and click on the link to reset your password.
PASSWORD_RESET_DESC: Please enter a new password now.
PASSWORD_RESET_ERROR_ALREADY_RESET: You have already reset your password with the link from your e-mail. You can use the {{link}} function again to get a new link.
REGISTER_AGB: I allow Axel Springer Ideas Engineering GmbH and Axel Springer People & Culture to contact me for news (e.g. start of a campaign and status of my idea) concerning Axel Springer Crowd. I have the possibility to unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time. To do this, I can click on the link in the footer of those e-mails. Further information on data protection can be found in the data protection declaration.
REGISTER_SUCCESS_DESC: Your registration under the name {{forename}} {{surname}} was successful. We sent an e-mail with a confirmation link to {{email}}. Please open your mailbox and click on the link to complete the registration.
